name: libgridxc
description:
A library to compute the exchange and correlation energy and potential
in spherical (i.e. an atom) or periodic systems.

dependencies.name: libxc
dependencies.description:
Libxc is a library of exchange-correlation functionals for density-
functional theory.

dependent_to.name: atom-dft
dependent_to.description:
ATOM is a program for DFT calculations in atoms and pseudopotential
generation.
